alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Northumberland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Northumberland and northwestern Lancaster Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wicomico Church, or 7 miles west of Fair Port, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Northumberland and northwestern Lancaster Counties, including the following locations... Lara, Browns Store, Somers, Regina, Alfonso, Avalon, Brook Vale, Nuttsville, Reedville and Lilian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern and east central Virginia.
